field.name: FUNC
field.description: Selects pin function. Values 0x2 to 0x7 are reserved

field.name: MODE
field.description: Selects function mode (on-chip pull-up/pull-down resistor control)

enumeratedValue.name: INPUT_NOT_INVERTED_
enumeratedValue.description: Input not inverted (HIGH on pin reads as 1, LOW on pin reads as 0)

enumeratedValue.name: INPUT_INVERTED_HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: Input inverted (HIGH on pin reads as 0, LOW on pin reads as 1)

enumeratedValue.name: OPEN_DRAIN_MODE_ENAB
enumeratedValue.description: Open-drain mode enabled. This is not a true open-drain mode

field.name: FUNC
field.description: Selects pin function. Values 0x2 to 0x7 are reserved

field.name: I2CMODE
field.description: Selects I2C mode (see Section 7.3.8). Select Standard mode (I2CMODE = 00, default) or Standard I/O functionality (I2CMODE = 01) if the pin function is GPIO (FUNC = 000)

register.name: PIO0_16
register.description: I/O configuration for pin PIO0_16/AD5/CT32B1_MAT3/ WAKEUP

field.name: FUNC
field.description: Selects pin function. This pin functions as WAKEUP pin if the LPC11Uxx is in Deep power-down mode regardless of the value of FUNC. Values 0x3 to 0x7 are reserved

field.name: MODE
field.description: Selects function mode (on-chip pull-up/pull-down resistor control)

enumeratedValue.name: INPUT_NOT_INVERTED_
enumeratedValue.description: Input not inverted (HIGH on pin reads as 1, LOW on pin reads as 0)

enumeratedValue.name: INPUT_INVERTED_HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: Input inverted (HIGH on pin reads as 0, LOW on pin reads as 1)

enumeratedValue.name: OPEN_DRAIN_MODE_ENAB
enumeratedValue.description: Open-drain mode enabled. This is not a true open-drain mode

register.name: PIO1_24
register.description: I/O configuration for pin PIO1_24/ CT32B0_MAT0

field.name: FUNC
field.description: Selects pin function. Values 0x2 to 0x7 are reserved

field.description: Selects function mode (on-chip pull-up/pull-down resistor control)

enumeratedValue.name: INPUT_INVERTED_HIGH
enumeratedValue.description: Input inverted (HIGH on pin reads as 0, LOW on pin reads as 1)

enumeratedValue.name: OPEN_DRAIN_MODE_ENAB
enumeratedValue.description: Open-drain mode enabled. This is not a true open-drain mode
